## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                              | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `--nv-title-color Color of the title`             |             |
| `--nv-title-font-family Font family of the title` |             |
| `--nv-title-font-size Font size of the title`     |             |
| `--nv-title-font-weight Font size of the title`   |             |
